mapper.sql: detail_id, header_id, product_name, item_id, item, item_specific_id, warehouse, weight, piece_num, description, created_by, created_date, last_updated_by, last_updated_date, organization_id
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO order_detail (header_id, product_name, item_id, item, item_specific_id, warehouse, weight, piece_num, description, created_by, created_date, last_updated_by, last_updated_date, organization_id) VALUES

insert into order_detail (header_id, product_name, item_id, item, item_specific_id, warehouse, weight, piece_num, description, created_by, created_date, last_updated_by, last_updated_date, organization_id) values (#{headerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemSpecificId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{warehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pieceNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{organizationId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
